    • Method Detail

      • encipher

        public void encipher(List<ClientOrder> orders,
                     File orderFile,
                     String senderKeyStoreName,
                     char[] senderKeyStorePassword,
                     String senderKeyName,
                     char[] senderKeyPassword,
                     String senderTrustStoreName,
                     char[] senderTrustStorePassword,
                     String recipientCertName)
              throws GeneralSecurityException,
                     IOException
        Writes the client order file.
        Key stores will be accessed as resources from the classpath.
        Specified by:
        encipher in interface ClientOrderCodec
        Parameters:
        orders - the orders to be submitted by the client
        orderFile - the file the encrypted order list is to be stored in
        senderKeyStoreName - the name of the sender's key store resource
        senderKeyStorePassword - the sender's key store password
        senderKeyName - the alias of the sender's private key
        senderKeyPassword - the password for the sender's private key
        senderTrustStoreName - the name of the sender's trust key store resource
        senderTrustStorePassword - the sender's trust store key
        recipientCertName - the alias of the recipient's certificate key
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - if any cryptographic operations fail
        IOException - if unable to write either of the files

      • decipher

        public List<ClientOrder> decipher(File orderFile,
                                  String recipientKeyStoreName,
                                  char[] recipientKeyStorePassword,
                                  String recipientKeyName,
                                  char[] recipientKeyPassword,
                                  String recipientTrustStoreName,
                                  char[] recipientTrustStorePassword,
                                  String signerCertName)
                           throws GeneralSecurityException,
                                  IOException
        Read an encrypted order list and signature from file and verify the order list data. Keystores will be accessed as resources, i.e. on the classpath.
        Specified by:
        decipher in interface ClientOrderCodec
        Parameters:
        orderFile - the file the encrypted order list is stored in
        recipientKeyStoreName - the name of the recipient's key store resource
        recipientKeyStorePassword - the recipient's key store password
        recipientKeyName - the alias of the recipient's private key
        recipientKeyPassword - the password for the recipient's private key
        recipientTrustStoreName - the name of the trust store resource
        recipientTrustStorePassword - the trust store password
        signerCertName - the name of the signer's certificate
        Returns:
        the client order list from the file
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - if any cryptographic operations fail
        IOException - if unable to write either of the files
